sen.j: 七本松通（しちほんまつどおり）は京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shichihonmatsu-dori Street is one of the south and north street in Kyoto City.
Shichihonmatsu-dori Street is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.
Shichihonmatsu-dori Street is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 寺之内通から南へ、姉小路通と三条通の間、および梅小路駅・東海道本線・東海道新幹線で中断して十条通まで。
sen.e: This street runs to south from Teranouchi-dori Street, and between Aneyako-ji Street and Sanjo-dori Street, and it stops at Emekoji Station, Tokaido Shinkansen of Tokaido Honsen Line, and goes to Sanjo-dori Street.

This street runs south from Teranouchi-dori Street, stopping between Aneyako-ji Street and Sanjo-dori Street, as well as Emekoji Station, Tokaido Shinkansen of Tokaido Honsen Line, before going to Sanjo-dori Street.

This street runs south from Teranouchi-dori Street, stopping between Aneyakoji-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street, as well as Umekoji Station, Tokaido Shinkansen of the Tokaido Honsen Line, before going to Sanjo-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Aneyakoji-dori Streetとしました。"Tokaido Honsen Line"→"the Tokaido Honsen Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 一部狭い区間があるが、山陰本線と御前通の間の主要な通りである。
sen.e: There is a narrow section part, but it's an important street between Sanin Honesn Line and Onemae-dori Street.
There is a section where it is extremely narrow, but it is considered an important street between Sanin Honesn Line and Onemae-dori Street.
There is a section where it is extremely narrow, but it is considered an important street between the Sanin Main Line and Onemae-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Sanin Main Lineとしました。"Sanin Main Line"→"the Sanin Main Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 四条通以南の一部区間では中新道とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: A part of the section from Shijo-dori Street to north is called Nakashinmichi.
A section from Shijo-dori Street in the south is called Nakashinmichi.
sen.cmt: Robert: This translator really messes up translating simple directions like "north" "south" etc…/Edited for flow
sen.e: A section from Shijo-dori Street in the south is called Nakashinmichi.

sen.j: 今出川通の上七軒交差点から真北へ、千本釈迦堂門前に延びるのが旧七本松通である。
sen.e: The street which extends to in front of Senbon Shaka-do from Kamishichiken Crossing on Imadegawa-dori Street to north is the former Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.
The street extending in front of Senbon Shaka-do from Kamishichiken Crossing on Imadegawa-dori Street to the north is the former Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.
The street extending in front of Senbon Shaka-do Temple from Kamishichiken Crossing on Imadegawa-dori Street to the north is the former Shichihonmatsu-dori Street.
